changeSet.id: Create BioCyc constraints and indexes
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Create constraints and indexes for BioCyc nodes, created on 06/21/2022

changeSet.id: load Species from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, date 06/21/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Species.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, 1 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Species:db_EcoCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.genome=row.genome,n.tax_id=row.tax_id,n.strain_name=row.strain_name,n.synonyms=row.synonyms,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load BioCycClass from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, date 06/21/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc BioCycClass.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, 7740 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:BioCycClass:db_EcoCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.url=row.url,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load Compound from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, date 06/21/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Compound.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, 7271 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Compound:db_EcoCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.abbrev_name=row.abbrev_name,n.url=row.url,n.inchi_key=row.inchi_key,n.inchi=row.inchi,n.smiles=row.smiles,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load DNABindingSite from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, date 06/21/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc DNABindingSite.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, 4128 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:DNABindingSite:db_EcoCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.abs_center_pos=row.abs_center_pos,n.site_length=row.site_length,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load Gene from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, date 06/21/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Gene.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, 4674 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Gene:db_EcoCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.name=row.name,n.accession=row.accession,n.url=row.url,n.accession2=row.accession2,n.left_end_position=row.left_end_position,n.right_end_position=row.right_end_position,n.strand=row.strand,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Reaction.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, 3017 rows

changeSet.id: load Regulation from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, date 06/21/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load BioCyc Regulation.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, 8704 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Regulation:db_EcoCyc,n.biocyc_id=row.biocyc_id,n.mode=row.mode,n.mechanism=row.mechanism,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: load Species synonyms from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, date 06/21/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load BioCyc Species-synonyms.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (a:Synonym {name: row.name}) SET a.lowercase_name=toLower(row.name) WITH row, a MATCH (b:Species {eid: row.eid}) MERGE (b)-[r:HAS_SYNONYM]->(a)

changeSet.id: load BioCycClass synonyms from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, date 06/21/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load BioCyc BioCycClass-synonyms.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (a:Synonym {name: row.name}) SET a.lowercase_name=toLower(row.name) WITH row, a MATCH (b:BioCycClass {eid: row.eid}) MERGE (b)-[r:HAS_SYNONYM]->(a)

changeSet.id: load TYPE_OF relationship in BioCycClass-rels.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip, date 06/21/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load BioCyc TYPE_OF relationships, BioCycClass-rels.tsv from EcoCyc-data-25.5.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row with row where row.RELATIONSHIP='TYPE_OF' MATCH (a:db_BioCyc {eid: row.from_id}), (b:db_BioCyc {eid: row.to_id}) MERGE (a)-[r:TYPE_OF]->(b) RETURN COUNT(*)
